SpartanWare

WHO WE ARE ?

We provide a cloud-based service for monitoring your cloud resources. With SpartanWare Dashboard our customers can view their cloud consumption data via highly interactive graphs.
Whether its hourly data or yearly, we are constantly monitoring the performance of your resources!". Our website is 100% responsive, so you can access it from your favorite device and browser.

Who We Are

At SpartanWare, we have highly skilled and professional team of dedicated software engineers to take care of your cloud-based projects.
Founded in 2014 SpartanWare is a California based company, focused on providing dashboards for monitoring cloud consumption with highly visual and interactive graphs.

PORTFOLIO

SpartanWare Dashboard

With SpartanWare dashboard customers can monitor their cloud consumption at the click of a button. Data on CPU Utilization, Memory Consumption and Disk Utilization can be viewed as interactive graphs.
